your_note.description: Private note about this user written by you

bearer.description: Token passed in Authorization header as Bearer

parameters.description: If true, will include `you_are_moderator` and `your_follow` in list. Requires login.

parameters.description: Filter to either communities you are following or waiting to follow. Requires login.

parameters.name: local
parameters.description: Filter to either local or remote communities.

parameters.name: use_aggregate_filters
parameters.description: If true, will omit posts from communities marked as hide_posts_from_aggregates

parameters.name: community
parameters.description: If present, will filter to posts approved in the specified community

parameters.name: created_within
